title: I need to know what all that in-game abbreviations mean.
body:
It's like whenever I play a team builder those guys chat like
{{champion:266}} '' hey {{champion:161}}  ff at the ss np mid''
{{champion:268}} '' no gg at hhp adc bot''
{{champion:22}} '' no need for an adc abc def ghi jkl mno pqr stu vwx at the top ''

and im like
{{champion:161}} ''sorry I don't speak gibberish ''

But i need to know these '' ffs , ff, adc, bla bla bla'' terms I can't keep track of so yeah thanks for the response

Never forget to buy the hair gel {{item:3070}} , By {{champion:83}}

replies.body:
FFS - For f*ck sakes
FF - Forfeit/Surrender
ADC - Attack Damage Carry
Bot - Bot Lane
Top - Top Lane
Mid - Mid Lane
Sup - Support
GG - Good Game.
TY - Thank you
NP - No problem.

something like that.

bot? bottom.
mid? middle.
sup? hi, whats up
nty, no thank you

SS summoner spells

double necro. from what the OP said SS would be for summoner spells. mia is missing/missing in action.
but if you read what was said, and what i wrote out as an explanation of the whole "chat" segment you would realize what the SS was for.

OMW - On my way
OOM - Out of mana

There was a great list on the old forums but riot 'lost' it moving to the 'new improved system'.

Stick with it and ask if you don't mind being laughed.
As Kamal said (referring to trolls on league) ' why are people so unkind'.

By the way I loved 

*HeartVine (OCE)
You forgot:
swag - secretly we are gay*

> It's like whenever I play a team builder those guys chat like
> {{champion:266}} '' hey {{champion:161}}  ff at the ss np mid'' damn vel koz summoners are bad for mid, surrender at 20.
> {{champion:268}} '' no gg at hhp adc bot'' dont surrender at 20, he has peel for the ADC at bot (support vel?)
> {{champion:22}} '' no need for an adc abc def ghi jkl mno pqr stu vwx at the top '' unknown message.....
> 
> and im like
> {{champion:161}} ''sorry I don't speak gibberish ''
> 
> But i need to know these '' ffs , ff, adc, bla bla bla'' terms I can't keep track of so yeah thanks for the response
> 
> Never forget to buy the hair gel {{item:3070}} , By {{champion:83}}

> {{champion:22}} '' no need for an adc abc def ghi jkl mno pqr stu vwx at the top '' unknown message.....

stfu - shut de feyk up
wtf - wat da fek
dra - drag
tb - their blue
tr - their red
ob - our blue (
or - our red (noobs dont tend to use this)
eshays - shes a lady i think 
yolo - i am degenerate
420 - i am degenerate which does drugs
yolo 420 - i am w()rthless piece of sh!t 
doc - d1e 0f ck@ncar

tf - Team Fight.

If there is no Twisted Fate in the game.
